verses.text: <w lemma="strong:H7225">起初</w>，　<w lemma="strong:H430">神</w><w lemma="strong:H1254 strong:H853" morph="StrongsMorph:H8804">创造</w><w lemma="strong:H8064 strong:H853">天</w><w lemma="strong:H776">地</w>。

<w lemma="strong:H776">地</w><w lemma="strong:H1961" morph="StrongsMorph:H8804">是</w><w lemma="strong:H8414">空虚</w><w lemma="strong:H922">混沌</w>，<w lemma="strong:H8415">渊</w><w lemma="strong:H5921 strong:H6440">面</w><w lemma="strong:H2822">黑暗</w>；　<w lemma="strong:H430">神</w><w lemma="strong:H7307">的灵</w><w lemma="strong:H7363" morph="StrongsMorph:H8764">运行</w><w lemma="strong:H5921">在</w><w lemma="strong:H4325">水</w><w lemma="strong:H6440">面</w>上。

<w lemma="strong:H430">神</w><w lemma="strong:H559" morph="StrongsMorph:H8799">说</w>：「<w lemma="strong:H1961" morph="StrongsMorph:H8799">要有</w><w lemma="strong:H216">光</w>」，<w lemma="strong:H1961" morph="StrongsMorph:H8799">就有了</w><w lemma="strong:H216">光</w>。

<w lemma="strong:H430">神</w><w lemma="strong:H7200 strong:H853" morph="StrongsMorph:H8799">看</w><w lemma="strong:H216 strong:H3588">光</w><w lemma="strong:H2896">是好的</w>，<w lemma="strong:H430"/><w lemma="strong:H996">就把</w><w lemma="strong:H216 strong:H996">光</w><w lemma="strong:H2822">暗</w><w lemma="strong:H914" morph="StrongsMorph:H8686">分开了</w>。

<w lemma="strong:H430">神</w><w lemma="strong:H7121" morph="StrongsMorph:H8799">称</w><w lemma="strong:H216">光</w>为「<w lemma="strong:H3117">昼</w>」，<w lemma="strong:H7121" morph="StrongsMorph:H8804">称</w><w lemma="strong:H2822">暗</w>为「<w lemma="strong:H3915">夜</w>」。<w lemma="strong:H1961" morph="StrongsMorph:H8799">有</w><w lemma="strong:H6153">晚上</w>，<w lemma="strong:H1961" morph="StrongsMorph:H8799">有</w><w lemma="strong:H1242">早晨</w>，<w lemma="strong:H259">这是头一</w><w lemma="strong:H3117">日</w>。

<w lemma="strong:H430">神</w><w lemma="strong:H559" morph="StrongsMorph:H8799">说</w>：「<w lemma="strong:H4325">诸水</w><w lemma="strong:H8432">之间</w><w lemma="strong:H1961" morph="StrongsMorph:H8799">要有</w><w lemma="strong:H7549">空气</w>，<w lemma="strong:H1961" morph="StrongsMorph:H8799">将</w><w lemma="strong:H996 strong:H4325">水</w><w lemma="strong:H914" morph="StrongsMorph:H8688">分</w><w lemma="strong:H4325">为上下</w>。」

<w lemma="strong:H430">神</w><w lemma="strong:H6213 strong:H853" morph="StrongsMorph:H8799">就造出</w><w lemma="strong:H7549">空气</w>，<w lemma="strong:H834">将</w><w lemma="strong:H7549">空气</w><w lemma="strong:H4480 strong:H8478">以下</w><w lemma="strong:H996 strong:H4325">的水</w>、<w lemma="strong:H7549 strong:H834">空气</w><w lemma="strong:H4480 strong:H5921">以上</w><w lemma="strong:H996 strong:H4325">的水</w><w lemma="strong:H914" morph="StrongsMorph:H8686">分开了</w>。<w lemma="strong:H3651">事就这样</w><w lemma="strong:H1961" morph="StrongsMorph:H8799">成了</w>。

<w lemma="strong:H430">神</w><w lemma="strong:H7121" morph="StrongsMorph:H8799">称</w><w lemma="strong:H7549">空气</w>为「<w lemma="strong:H8064">天</w>」。<w lemma="strong:H1961" morph="StrongsMorph:H8799">有</w><w lemma="strong:H6153">晚上</w>，<w lemma="strong:H1961" morph="StrongsMorph:H8799">有</w><w lemma="strong:H1242">早晨</w>，<w lemma="strong:H8145">是第二</w><w lemma="strong:H3117">日</w>。

<w lemma="strong:H430">神</w><w lemma="strong:H559" morph="StrongsMorph:H8799">说</w>：「<w lemma="strong:H8064">天</w><w lemma="strong:H4480 strong:H8478">下</w><w lemma="strong:H4325">的水</w><w lemma="strong:H6960" morph="StrongsMorph:H8735">要聚</w><w lemma="strong:H413">在</w><w lemma="strong:H259">一</w><w lemma="strong:H4725">处</w>，<w lemma="strong:H3004">使旱地</w><w lemma="strong:H7200" morph="StrongsMorph:H8735">露出来</w>。」<w lemma="strong:H3651">事就这样</w><w lemma="strong:H1961" morph="StrongsMorph:H8799">成了</w>。

<w lemma="strong:H430">神</w><w lemma="strong:H7121" morph="StrongsMorph:H8799">称</w><w lemma="strong:H3004">旱地</w>为「<w lemma="strong:H776">地</w>」，<w lemma="strong:H7121" morph="StrongsMorph:H8804">称</w><w lemma="strong:H4325">水</w><w lemma="strong:H4723">的聚处</w>为「<w lemma="strong:H3220">海</w>」。　<w lemma="strong:H430">神</w><w lemma="strong:H7200 strong:H3588" morph="StrongsMorph:H8799">看著</w><w lemma="strong:H2896">是好的</w>。

<w lemma="strong:H430">神</w><w lemma="strong:H559" morph="StrongsMorph:H8799">说</w>：「<w lemma="strong:H776">地</w><w lemma="strong:H1876" morph="StrongsMorph:H8686">要发生</w><w lemma="strong:H1877">青草</w><w lemma="strong:H2232" morph="StrongsMorph:H8688">和结</w><w lemma="strong:H2233">种子</w><w lemma="strong:H6212">的菜蔬</w>，<w lemma="strong:H6213" morph="StrongsMorph:H8802">并结</w><w lemma="strong:H6529">果子</w><w lemma="strong:H6529 strong:H6086">的树木</w>，<w lemma="strong:H4327">各从其类</w>，<w lemma="strong:H834">果子</w><w lemma="strong:H2233 ">都包著核</w>。」<w lemma="strong:H5921 strong:H776"/><w lemma="strong:H3651">事就这样</w><w lemma="strong:H1961" morph="StrongsMorph:H8799">成了</w>。

<w lemma="strong:H776">于是地</w><w lemma="strong:H3318" morph="StrongsMorph:H8686">发生了</w><w lemma="strong:H1877">青草</w><w lemma="strong:H2232" morph="StrongsMorph:H8688">和结</w><w lemma="strong:H2233">种子</w><w lemma="strong:H6212">的菜蔬</w>，<w lemma="strong:H4327">各从其类</w>；<w lemma="strong:H6213" morph="StrongsMorph:H8802">并结</w><w lemma="strong:H6529">果子</w><w lemma="strong:H6086">的树木</w>，<w lemma="strong:H4327">各从其类</w>；<w lemma="strong:H834">果子</w><w lemma="strong:H2233 ">都包著核</w>。　<w lemma="strong:H430">神</w><w lemma="strong:H7200 strong:H3588" morph="StrongsMorph:H8799">看著</w><w lemma="strong:H2896">是好的</w>。

<w lemma="strong:H1961" morph="StrongsMorph:H8799">有</w><w lemma="strong:H6153">晚上</w>，<w lemma="strong:H1961" morph="StrongsMorph:H8799">有</w><w lemma="strong:H1242">早晨</w>，<w lemma="strong:H7992">是第三</w><w lemma="strong:H3117">日</w>。

<w lemma="strong:H430">神</w><w lemma="strong:H559" morph="StrongsMorph:H8799">说</w>：「<w lemma="strong:H7549 strong:H8064">天上</w><w lemma="strong:H1961" morph="StrongsMorph:H8799">要有</w><w lemma="strong:H3974">光体</w>，<w lemma="strong:H914 strong:H996" morph="StrongsMorph:H8687">可以分</w><w lemma="strong:H3117 strong:H996">昼</w><w lemma="strong:H3915">夜</w>，<w lemma="strong:H1961" morph="StrongsMorph:H8804"/><w lemma="strong:H226">作记号</w>，<w lemma="strong:H4150">定节令</w>、<w lemma="strong:H3117">日子</w>、<w lemma="strong:H8141">年岁</w>，

<w lemma="strong:H1961" morph="StrongsMorph:H8804">并要</w><w lemma="strong:H3974">发光</w><w lemma="strong:H8064">在天</w><w lemma="strong:H7549">空</w>，<w lemma="strong:H215" morph="StrongsMorph:H8687">普照</w><w lemma="strong:H5921">在</w><w lemma="strong:H776">地上</w>。」<w lemma="strong:H3651">事就这样</w><w lemma="strong:H1961" morph="StrongsMorph:H8799">成了</w>。

于是　<w lemma="strong:H430">神</w><w lemma="strong:H6213 strong:H853" morph="StrongsMorph:H8799">造了</w><w lemma="strong:H8147">两个</w><w lemma="strong:H1419">大</w><w lemma="strong:H3974">光</w>，<w lemma="strong:H853"/><w lemma="strong:H1419 strong:H3974">大的</w><w lemma="strong:H4475">管</w><w lemma="strong:H3117">昼</w>，<w lemma="strong:H853"/><w lemma="strong:H6996 strong:H3974">小的</w><w lemma="strong:H4475">管</w><w lemma="strong:H3915">夜</w>，<w lemma="strong:H853">又造</w><w lemma="strong:H3556">众星</w>，

<w lemma="strong:H430"/><w lemma="strong:H853">就把这些光</w><w lemma="strong:H5414" morph="StrongsMorph:H8799">摆列</w><w lemma="strong:H8064">在天</w><w lemma="strong:H7549">空</w>，<w lemma="strong:H215" morph="StrongsMorph:H8687">普照</w><w lemma="strong:H5921">在</w><w lemma="strong:H776">地上</w>，

<w lemma="strong:H4910" morph="StrongsMorph:H8800">管理</w><w lemma="strong:H3117">昼</w><w lemma="strong:H3915">夜</w>，<w lemma="strong:H914 strong:H996" morph="StrongsMorph:H8687">分别</w><w lemma="strong:H216 strong:H996">明</w><w lemma="strong:H2822">暗</w>。　<w lemma="strong:H430">神</w><w lemma="strong:H7200 strong:H3588" morph="StrongsMorph:H8799">看著</w><w lemma="strong:H2896">是好的</w>。

<w lemma="strong:H1961" morph="StrongsMorph:H8799">有</w><w lemma="strong:H6153">晚上</w>，<w lemma="strong:H1961" morph="StrongsMorph:H8799">有</w><w lemma="strong:H1242">早晨</w>，<w lemma="strong:H7243">是第四</w><w lemma="strong:H3117">日</w>。

<w lemma="strong:H430">神</w><w lemma="strong:H559" morph="StrongsMorph:H8799">说</w>：「<w lemma="strong:H4325">水</w><w lemma="strong:H8317" morph="StrongsMorph:H8799">要多多滋生</w><w lemma="strong:H5315 strong:H2416">有生命</w><w lemma="strong:H8318">的物</w>；<w lemma="strong:H5775">要有雀鸟</w><w lemma="strong:H5774" morph="StrongsMorph:H8787">飞</w><w lemma="strong:H5921">在</w><w lemma="strong:H776">地面以上</w>，<w lemma="strong:H8064">天</w><w lemma="strong:H7549">空</w>之中（<w lemma="strong:H5921 strong:H6440">原文作天空的表面</w>）。」

<w lemma="strong:H430">神</w><w lemma="strong:H1254 strong:H853" morph="StrongsMorph:H8799">就造出</w><w lemma="strong:H1419">大</w><w lemma="strong:H8577">鱼</w><w lemma="strong:H853">和</w><w lemma="strong:H4325">水</w><w lemma="strong:H834">中所</w><w lemma="strong:H8317" morph="StrongsMorph:H8804">滋生</w><w lemma="strong:H3605">各样</w><w lemma="strong:H2416">有生命</w><w lemma="strong:H7430" morph="StrongsMorph:H8802">的动</w><w lemma="strong:H5315">物</w>，<w lemma="strong:H4327">各从其类</w>；<w lemma="strong:H853">又造出</w><w lemma="strong:H3605">各样</w><w lemma="strong:H3671">飞</w><w lemma="strong:H5775">鸟</w>，<w lemma="strong:H4327">各从其类</w>。　<w lemma="strong:H430">神</w><w lemma="strong:H7200 strong:H3588" morph="StrongsMorph:H8799">看著</w><w lemma="strong:H2896">是好的</w>。

<w lemma="strong:H430">神</w><w lemma="strong:H1288" morph="StrongsMorph:H8762">就赐福</w><w lemma="strong:H853">给这一切</w>，<w lemma="strong:H559" morph="StrongsMorph:H8800">说</w>：「<w lemma="strong:H6509" morph="StrongsMorph:H8798">滋生</w><w lemma="strong:H7235" morph="StrongsMorph:H8798">繁多</w>，<w lemma="strong:H4390 strong:H853" morph="StrongsMorph:H8798">充满</w><w lemma="strong:H3220">海中</w><w lemma="strong:H4325">的水</w>；<w lemma="strong:H5775">雀鸟</w><w lemma="strong:H7235" morph="StrongsMorph:H8799">也要多生</w><w lemma="strong:H776">在地上</w>。」

<w lemma="strong:H1961" morph="StrongsMorph:H8799">有</w><w lemma="strong:H6153">晚上</w>，<w lemma="strong:H1961" morph="StrongsMorph:H8799">有</w><w lemma="strong:H1242">早晨</w>，<w lemma="strong:H2549">是第五</w><w lemma="strong:H3117">日</w>。

<w lemma="strong:H430">神</w><w lemma="strong:H559" morph="StrongsMorph:H8799">说</w>：「<w lemma="strong:H776">地</w><w lemma="strong:H3318" morph="StrongsMorph:H8686">要生出</w><w lemma="strong:H2416">活</w><w lemma="strong:H5315">物</w>来，<w lemma="strong:H4327">各从其类</w>；<w lemma="strong:H929">牲畜</w>、<w lemma="strong:H7431">昆虫</w>、<w lemma="strong:H2416 strong:H776">野兽</w>，<w lemma="strong:H4327">各从其类</w>。」<w lemma="strong:H3651">事就这样</w><w lemma="strong:H1961" morph="StrongsMorph:H8799">成了</w>。

于是　<w lemma="strong:H430">神</w><w lemma="strong:H6213 strong:H853" morph="StrongsMorph:H8799">造出</w><w lemma="strong:H2416 strong:H776">野兽</w>，<w lemma="strong:H4327">各从其类</w>；<w lemma="strong:H853"/><w lemma="strong:H929">牲畜</w>，<w lemma="strong:H4327">各从其类</w>；<w lemma="strong:H853"/><w lemma="strong:H127">地上</w><w lemma="strong:H3605">一切</w><w lemma="strong:H7431">昆虫</w>，<w lemma="strong:H4327">各从其类</w>。　<w lemma="strong:H430">神</w><w lemma="strong:H7200 strong:H3588" morph="StrongsMorph:H8799">看著</w><w lemma="strong:H2896">是好的</w>。

<w lemma="strong:H430">神</w><w lemma="strong:H559" morph="StrongsMorph:H8799">说</w>：「<w lemma="strong:H6754">我们要照著我们的形像</w>、<w lemma="strong:H1823">按著我们的样式</w><w lemma="strong:H6213" morph="StrongsMorph:H8799">造</w><w lemma="strong:H120">人</w>，<w lemma="strong:H7287" morph="StrongsMorph:H8799">使他们管理</w><w lemma="strong:H3220">海</w><w lemma="strong:H1710">里的鱼</w>、<w lemma="strong:H8064">空</w><w lemma="strong:H5775">中的鸟</w>、<w lemma="strong:H929">地上的牲畜</w>，<w lemma="strong:H3605">和全</w><w lemma="strong:H776">地</w>，<w lemma="strong:H5921 strong:H776">并地上</w><w lemma="strong:H7430" morph="StrongsMorph:H8802">所爬的</w><w lemma="strong:H3605">一切</w><w lemma="strong:H7431">昆虫</w>。」

<w lemma="strong:H430">神</w><w lemma="strong:H6754">就照著自己的形像</w><w lemma="strong:H1254 strong:H853" morph="StrongsMorph:H8799">造</w><w lemma="strong:H120">人</w>，<w lemma="strong:H430">乃是照著他</w><w lemma="strong:H6754">的形像</w><w lemma="strong:H1254 strong:H853" morph="StrongsMorph:H8804">造</w><w lemma="strong:H2145">男</w><w lemma="strong:H5347 strong:H1254 strong:H853" morph="StrongsMorph:H8804">造女</w>。

<w lemma="strong:H430">神</w><w lemma="strong:H1288" morph="StrongsMorph:H8762">就赐福</w><w lemma="strong:H853">给他们</w>，<w lemma="strong:H430"/><w lemma="">又对他们</w><w lemma="strong:H559" morph="StrongsMorph:H8799">说</w>：「<w lemma="strong:H6509" morph="StrongsMorph:H8798">要生养</w><w lemma="strong:H7235" morph="StrongsMorph:H8798">众多</w>，<w lemma="strong:H4390 strong:H853" morph="StrongsMorph:H8798">遍满</w><w lemma="strong:H776">地面</w>，<w lemma="strong:H3533" morph="StrongsMorph:H8798">治理</w>这地，<w lemma="strong:H7287" morph="StrongsMorph:H8798">也要管理</w><w lemma="strong:H3220">海</w><w lemma="strong:H1710">里的鱼</w>、<w lemma="strong:H8064">空</w><w lemma="strong:H5775">中的鸟</w>，<w lemma="strong:H5921 strong:H776">和地上</w><w lemma="strong:H3605">各样</w><w lemma="strong:H7430" morph="StrongsMorph:H8802">行动的</w><w lemma="strong:H2416">活物</w>。」

<w lemma="strong:H430">神</w><w lemma="strong:H559" morph="StrongsMorph:H8799">说</w>：「<w lemma="strong:H2009">看哪</w>，<w lemma="strong:H853 strong:H834">我将</w><w lemma="strong:H3605">遍</w><w lemma="strong:H776">地</w><w lemma="strong:H5921 strong:H6440">上</w><w lemma="strong:H3605">一切</w><w lemma="strong:H2232" morph="StrongsMorph:H8802">结</w><w lemma="strong:H2233">种子</w><w lemma="strong:H6212">的菜蔬</w><w lemma="strong:H853">和</w><w lemma="strong:H3605">一切</w><w lemma="strong:H6086">树</w><w lemma="">上</w><w lemma="strong:H834">所</w><w lemma="strong:H2232" morph="StrongsMorph:H8802">结</w><w lemma="strong:H2233">有核</w><w lemma="strong:H6529">的果子</w><w lemma="strong:H5414" morph="StrongsMorph:H8804">全赐</w><w lemma="">给你们</w><w lemma="strong:H1961" morph="StrongsMorph:H8799">作</w><w lemma="strong:H402">食物</w>。

<w lemma="strong:H3605">至于</w><w lemma="strong:H776">地上</w><w lemma="strong:H2416">的走兽</w><w lemma="strong:H3605">和</w><w lemma="strong:H8064">空中</w><w lemma="strong:H5775">的飞鸟</w>，<w lemma="strong:H3605">并各样</w><w lemma="strong:H7430" morph="StrongsMorph:H8802">爬</w><w lemma="strong:H5921">在</w><w lemma="strong:H776">地上</w><w lemma="strong:H834 ">有</w><w lemma="strong:H2416">生命</w><w lemma="strong:H5315">的物</w>，<w lemma="strong:H853 strong:H3605">我将</w><w lemma="strong:H3418">青</w><w lemma="strong:H6212">草</w><w lemma="strong:H402">赐给牠们作食物</w>。」<w lemma="strong:H3651">事就这样</w><w lemma="strong:H1961" morph="StrongsMorph:H8799">成了</w>。

<w lemma="strong:H430">神</w><w lemma="strong:H7200 strong:H853" morph="StrongsMorph:H8799">看著</w><w lemma="strong:H3605">一切</w><w lemma="strong:H834">所</w><w lemma="strong:H6213" morph="StrongsMorph:H8804">造</w><w lemma="strong:H2009">的</w><w lemma="strong:H3966">都甚</w><w lemma="strong:H2896">好</w>。<w lemma="strong:H1961" morph="StrongsMorph:H8799">有</w><w lemma="strong:H6153">晚上</w>，<w lemma="strong:H1961" morph="StrongsMorph:H8799">有</w><w lemma="strong:H1242">早晨</w>，<w lemma="strong:H8345">是第六</w><w lemma="strong:H3117">日</w>。  <chapter eID="gen2" osisID="Gen.1"/>
